messages.message: not sure who to tag about this, so leaving it here... seems like we messed up some of our borders / pixels on the homepage. see screenshots attached
this is in the deployment and review cards on the home page
same thing at the top of those cards

this is pretty small, so let me be clear about the feedback: the tables that have the deployments and documents in them look like to have rounded corners, which doesn't make sense since they are already in a card that has rounded corners, which leads to these weird areas

so strange - @Jessica @Liam Callanan are you aware of any recent changes that would be relevant?

btw aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com) is currently on 25.04, so the recent Pollen upgrade this week isn't related
and additionally, it seems like in the last row there are two borders, one rounded and one 90 degree, which is redundant and looks pretty off
zoomed in with notes for clarity

I noticed this a while back (not Pollen related but the usage here is missing some style props), glad weâ€™re picking up on these!
The card headers also have some vertical alignment that needs to be fixed.

I can put out a quick fix today
also, while I'm here
can someone just delete this whole section
I know we're working on a redesign, but in the meantime let's just get rid of this
@margaret.tomaszczuk fyi
aligned @Clemens - we'll get it planned.
don't plan it, just delete it
I'm sure we'll find a brave engineer :smile:
bias for action
ha, i mean, in an upcoming sprint. but if someone wants to dump it i'm also goo
@charlie suggested 100 px padding between search and stuff below if someone wants to go for it. cc: @Rakesh @Subash :grin:
otherwise I'll request github access again and try to do it myself... this is a threat :grin:
@charlie can you chime in with your suggestion here please?

@Clemens any objection to swapping '_*try asking*_' with '_*jump back in*_' ?

having a mini-header for the content below is helpful orientation

Lol, I can delete that section this afternoon and the change will be in 25.08. I'll also backport it to 25.06 (though depending on the release certification it may not make it into the Tuesday deployment)
Exec decision let's go for 25.06 @Jessica - go ahead and add Charlie's logo as suggested.

@Jessica lmk if you want a second set of eyes on spacing

sharing mocks from previous chat
@charlie will send you a screenshot once I have the change!
love it, bias for action
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/68074
@charlie just a (minor) thought on the "jump back in" ... that won't make sense in the empty state
when you dont have any chats / projects / etc
I can check that logic and not show it if you don't have any assets
Do we only want to show that text when search is enabled? It looks a little off when it's disabled (maybe it's just the spacing?):
I actually wonder if we can just leave it out
for now... in the redesign we can consider that
i'd agree - having it float there looks off
So just like this?
that's fine with me -- know it's not ideal but right now no one has search anyway :smile:
And we also want this removed on the search page, correct?
Also, shoutout to @Liam Callanan for his PR - his PR fixes a lot of other little alignment things and it's amazing what a difference it makes
